comments:
3.0RC1

Bug 64933 may be related to this one.

- start job holding workspace lock during the following steps (e.g., with
org.eclipse.ui.examples.job plugin)
- open properties on a Java project or source folder (and probably other containers)
- set a different encoding on the Info page
- click Ok
-> nothing happens
- click Ok again
-> the dialog closes and an error dialog appears, the following exception is
written to the log file:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
